    • Method Detail

      • predicatesMet

        static <P extends IGrowthRequirementParcel,D extends IEventFutureDecisionMaker> EventFutureAssessment predicatesMet(P parcel,
                                                                                                                    java.util.List<java.util.function.Predicate<P>> predicates,
                                                                                                                    D decisionmaker,
                                                                                                                    EventFutureAssessment positive,
                                                                                                                    EventFutureAssessment negative)
        tests the provided predicates with the provided parcel, transforming them into a respective list of EventFutureAssessments and makes a decision based on the provided decision-maker
        Type Parameters:
        P - any variation of IGrowthRequirementParcel
        D - any variation of IEventFutureDecisionMaker
        Parameters:
        parcel - the parcel
        predicates - the predicates
        decisionmaker - the decision-maker
        positive - the EventFutureAssessment to choose in case the tested Predicate returns true
        negative - the EventFutureAssessment to choose in case the tested Predicate returns false
        Returns:
        a EventFutureAssessment returned form the provided IEventFutureDecisionMaker

      • registerCrop

        boolean registerCrop(java.lang.Class<? extends net.minecraft.block.Block> cropClass,
                     java.util.List<java.util.function.Predicate<P>> requirements)
        Registers a crop in this processor with the respective growth requirements
        Parameters:
        cropClass - the class of the crop
        requirements - the requirements as a List consisting of Predicates
        Returns:
        • true if and only if the crop was successfully registered and will be considered in case a matching BlockEvent.CropGrowEvent.Pre-event is fired
        • false otherwise

      • unregisterCrop

        boolean unregisterCrop(java.lang.Class<? extends net.minecraft.block.Block> cropClass)
        Unregisters the provided class and its associated predicates in case it was present
        Parameters:
        cropClass - the class of the crop-block
        Returns:
        • true if and only if there was a crop-class registered which was reference-equal with the provided class and it was successfully removed from the processor's registry
        • false otherwise

      • hasCropRegistered

        default boolean hasCropRegistered(java.lang.Class<? extends net.minecraft.block.Block> cropClass)
        Checks whether the provided crop-block class is registered in this processor
        Parameters:
        cropClass - the class of the respective crop-block
        Returns:
        • true if and only if there was a crop-class registered which was reference-equal with the provided class
        • false otherwise
